content: Is there code currently available that formalizes the balancing properties for AVL trees (or other well-known balanced BSTs)? I see that Batteries has an RBMap module with accompanying lemmas for Red-Black trees; are there similar libraries out there?
Lean core merged an implementation of weight-balanced trees today which contains (pretty hairy) proofs about balancing, see here.
Wow, that's some incredible timing on my part then! Thanks!
